Name.BusinessNameLine1: COLLINGTON EPISCOPAL LIFE CARE COMMUNITY INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: PROVISION OF CARE TO THE ELDERLY
IRS990.MissionDescription: Provision of Care to the Elderly
IRS990.Description: TO DEVELOP, CONSTRUCT & OPERATE A CONTINUING CARE RETIREMENT COMMUNITY THAT PROVIDES FOR THE PRIMARY NEEDS(HOUSING & FOOD) AS WELL AS THE PHYSICAL, RECREATIONAL, AND EMOTIONAL NEEDS OF THE ELDERLY.

OtherAssets.Description: Interest in Net Assets of Collington Foundation

OtherLiabilities.Description: Obligation under interest rate swap agreement

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Collington Episcopal Life Care Community, Inc. is exempt from federal income taxes under Section 501(c)(3) of the Internal Revenue Code; accordingly, no provision for income taxes is required. Collington Episcopal Life Care Community, Inc. follows the provisions of the income tax standard regarding the recognition and measurement of uncertain tax positions. The application of these provisions has no impact on Collington Episcopal Life Care Community, Inc.'s financial statements. Collington Episcopal Life Care Community, Inc.'s tax return is subject to review and examination by federal and state authorities. The tax returns for the tax years 2006 to 2008 are open to examination by federal and state authorities.
Change in Fair Value of Interest Swap Agreements: 505750. Change in Interest in the Net Assets of Collington Foundation, Inc. : 570870.
Change in FV of Interest Rate Swap Agreements: 505750.

Form990ScheduleJPartIII.Explanation: Providing first class or charter travel to the Organizations officer, director, trustee, key employee or highest compensated employee was paid by Life Care Services (LCS) and not by Collington Episcopal Life Care Community.

Form990ScheduleKPartI.DescriptionOfPurpose: To refinance both the series 1994 and series 2001 bonds.
To refinance both the series 1994 and series 2001 bonds.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: Top management official - Employeed by Life Care Services.
Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: Management fees of $832,358 paid by Collington Episcopal Life Care community to Life Care Services, LLC (LCS). This included salary of $183,311 and benefits of $10,578 to Larry Mabry.

Form990ScheduleLPartIV.Relationship: Top Financial official - Employeed by life care services.
Form990ScheduleLPartIV.DescriptionOfTransaction: Salary of $156,218 and benefits of $14,268 paid by Life Care Services, LLC

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, line 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Organization entered into an agreement with Life Care Services LLC dated October 2, 2003 to manage, operate and maintain Collington Episcopal Life Care Community, Inc.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Prior to filing the form 990 the Board of Trustees will receive a copy of the 990, they will review and approve it.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization enforces the written conflict of interest policy by annually being reviewed and executed by the Board Members and senior staff members.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization entered into an agreement with Life Care Services LLC to manage, operate and maintain Collington Episcopal Life Care Community, Inc. The Organization's CEO and HCA are Life Care Services employees. Their compensations are paid directly by Life Care Services and not by the Organization. LCS is paid a management fee by CELCC.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The organization makes its governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements available to the public upon request.
This process has not changed from the prior year.

Form990ScheduleRPartII.PrimaryActivities: To provide management services to Collington Episcopal Life Care Community.
